name: Great Eagle of the Treasure Tree, Hraesvelgr
text:
Flying
Continuous: If there are no cards with the word "Yggdrasil" in its name in any field, this card's ATK and DEF becomes [300/300].
Continuous: During battle phase, this card cannot be dealt any battle damage from dark attribute resonators. At the end of battle phase, destroy target dark attribute resonator that this card battled.
